channel.title: How to convert a file into .zip
channel.description: Ok i can only convert into .rar but i want to know how to convert into .zip because alot of my players don't have winrar.

item.title: How to convert a file into .zip
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[quote=“primadude, post:9, topic:249894”][quote author=firewithin3 link=topic=329442.msg2575481#msg2575481 date=1228941536]

Ok i can only convert into .rar but i want to know how to convert into .zip because alot of my players don’t have winrar.

The real solution is to tell them to get winrar or your gonna ip ban them!

winrar is the only compression program you should ever use… it opens every archive file possible. (cant compress all though)
[/quote]Sorry, you’re incorrect. 7zip has a much higher compression ratio and is way better.

A lot of people don’t have 7Zip though.[/quote]That’s no reason to say winrar is the only one you should ever use.

Read full topic
item.source: How to convert a file into .zip

item.title: How to convert a file into .zip
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Right click the folder, click add to archive, there should be two options.

‘.Rar’
‘.Zip’

Click .Zip and click ok.

Read full topic
